name: Transfer Adobe Commerce customers to KlickTipp
description:
This scenario listens for new or updated customers in Adobe Commerce and automatically creates or updates their profiles in KlickTipp. Key details such as first name, last name and email address are mapped directly into your KlickTipp account without any manual steps. Every new customer record enriches your database, ensuring you always have the latest contact information at your fingertips.

Perfect for e-commerce businesses, online retailers, and digital shops that want to eliminate manual data entry and guarantee every customer is captured in real time. With each new customer synced, you can immediately start building relationships, launch welcome campaigns, or trigger automated onboarding sequences.

You can also assign fixed or dynamic tags based on customer attributes such as location, customer group, or registration source. These tags flow directly into your KlickTipp campaigns, enabling highly targeted segmentation, personalized communication, and loyalty building from the very first interaction.

With this seamless flow, your database remains clean, organized, and always up to date â€” reflecting exactly who your customers are and how best to engage with them.
